Articles.Content:
MechJeb is allowed and is already present on the craft. You are allowed to remove it if needed!

Craft file:http://www./download/n9zx30vz38fla2a/USSat_I.craft

This challenge is to put the craft above into orbit and possibly beyond.The scoring system works by amount of fuel left with each litre of fuel being 100 points, so 0.24 litres is 24 points.There will also be bonus points for various achievements for doing things like crashing into the Mun or leaving kerbin's SoI. So without further ado here is the leaderboard and achievements.

Crash!Return the craft to Kerbin. 150 pts

Jeb's doing Land within 2.5 km of the launchpad. 500 pts

No robots here!Remove MechJeb and do it yourself 180 pts

Robot zone Use MechJeb -800 pts

Mun Express Crash it into the Mun 880 pts

Solar Traveller Get into orbit around Kerbol 800 pts

Kerbalmania! Add a seat and get a kerbal on board! Ladders allowed if needed 520 pts

More achievements as I think of them!(Suggestions are welcome)

Leaderboards

MechJebified

My entry coming soon

Edited July 18, 2013 by mavlymax

800 points for mech jeb?

it's minus 800 points for mechjeb

I'm seriously pissed off with you, mavlymax:

have you tried flying your rocket at all, before dumping it here?

forget about the Mun, this thing has problems reaching orbit.

you built this using Mechjeb, in fact, I didn't even had to add it to the rocket:

why didn't you check its delta-v?

I couldn't get this thing into orbit despite my best efforts... However if you replace the 2nd stage engine with a LV-909, then you have a stable rocket that easily makes orbit with fuel to spare.

Edited July 17, 2013 by Coneshot

180+880+800+520=2380 pts

I win, I don't think you can get more than that with the achievements available.

It looks like for some people my design doesn't have enough delta-v to even get into orbit. So as Coneshot said if you replace the LV-T45 with an LV-909 you will still get points, but you will be in the same category

Edited July 18, 2013 by mavlymax

Lul "for some people", does that mean on your PC it has more ?

Also I had serious laugh since i was fully expecting LV-909 at the second stage and then BAM, even more thrust! I lost my socks from the rapid acceleration.

@1096bimu With that sleek craft you could also land on KSC and then crash on the Mun!

Lul "for some people", does that mean on your PC it has more ?

Also I had serious laugh since i was fully expecting LV-909 at the second stage and then BAM, even more thrust! I lost my socks from the rapid acceleration.

@1096bimu With that sleek craft you could also land on KSC and then crash on the Mun!

oh yes that's right, I didn't think of that!
